name: 0utsider
description:
You play as an 0utsider, in a strange new land.

Listen to characters carefully and select singular words of dialog or narration to progress through the story.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019, the mechanics, art, and themes are designed to revolve around the prompt, "Only one".

Music credits:

Rad Skeleton
